# <a name="organize-your-email"></a><span data-ttu-id="35a22-102">Organizovanje e-pošti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35a22-102">Organize your email</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35a22-103">Možete da koristite komande kao **obori** i **premestite** da automatski izbrišete ili premestite poruke od određenog pošiljaoca.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35a22-103">You can use commands like **Sweep** and **Move to** to automatically delete or move messages from a particular sender.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="35a22-104">Ove komande se pojavljuju iznad liste poruka kada izaberete poruku u prijemnom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35a22-104">These commands appear above the message list when you select a message in your inbox.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="35a22-105">**Čišćenje**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35a22-105">**Sweep**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="35a22-106">vam omogućava da brzo brisanje poruke u prijemnom poštanskom sandučetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35a22-106">lets you quickly delete messages in your inbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="35a22-107">Možete automatski izbrisati sve dolazne e-poruke od tog pošiljaoca, nastavi samo najnovije e-poštu i izbrisati ostale, ili brisanje e-poruke starije od 10 dana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35a22-107">You can automatically delete all incoming email from that sender, keep only the latest email and delete the rest, or delete email older than 10 days.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="35a22-108">**Premesti u**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35a22-108">**Move to**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="35a22-109">omogućava vam da premestite poruku određenu poruku u drugu fasciklu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35a22-109">lets you move a message a specific message to another folder.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="35a22-110">Da biste saznali više, vidim [rad sa fascikle za poruke u programu Outlook na Webu](https://support.office.com/article/ae0f10d6-54e7-4f29-acd3-78cdc3fdcb9f).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="35a22-110">To learn more, see [Working with message folders in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/ae0f10d6-54e7-4f29-acd3-78cdc3fdcb9f).</span></span>
